choices: Fun with the nurses and their boss

1.content:
It's a sunny day in Konoha as the famous Konoha hospital have been booming with many patients in their hospital beds.

To start the day, in her office Tsunade Senju is lustifully looking at her top 4 nurses as they clearly are all naked and their pussies wet knowing that they need to take care of this first before going forward with tending to their patients.
1.title: The start of a steamy day

info.brief_description: Things are getting hot in the famous Konoha hospital
info.description:
In the famous Konoha Hospital, many Shinobi whether it's Konoha or others they are in need of the services of Tsunade along with her top 4 nurses, Naruko, Tsunade's adopted daughter, Hinata, Naruko's girlfriend, Satsuki, Naruko's rival and Sakura, Satsuki's girlfriend

Anything goes for this story as these 4 bisexual nurses that will not only have fun with each other and is able to swap out with their partners at anytime but also that they are in a relationship with their boss as well and have fun with any person that needs assistance whether it's their fellow ninjas from Konoha but also other villages as well.
